name: get_relevant_context
description: Search conversation history and synthesize relevant context for current query. This helps agents understand what the user has done recently and what's relevant to their current request.

user_id.description: User ID to get context for

query.description: Current query or topic to find relevant context for

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to analyze (default: 10)

recency_weight.description: How much to favor recent vs relevant (0-1, default: 0.7). Higher values favor recency.

include_cache.description: Use cached summary if available (default: true)
